category: Herbs that Transform Phlegm and Stop Coughing

action.primary: Transforms Phlegm, cools and Transforms Phlegm-Heat and stops coughing, moistens Dryness, nourishes Fluids, promotes urination, softens hardened nodules and masses, and benefits the Kidneys

indications: Edema, goiter, tumors, nodules, abdominal mass

contraindications: Contraindicated for those who have Deficiency of the Stomach.
Contraindicated for those taking blood-thinning medication.
Overuse of Hai Dai can suppress thyroid function.

notes: Studies demonstrate that Hai Dai has anti-fungal properties.
Its actions mirror those of Thallus Eckloniae #{KunBu} Kun Bu, for which it is used interchangeably, but less commonly.
